scripts.dev_remote-start: ssh deploy@trademuch.trunksys.com 'export NVM_DIR="/home/deploy/.nvm";[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh";cp ~/trademuch_dev_local.js ~/trademuch/config/local.js; cd trademuch && pm2 start app.js -i 0 --name "trademuch"'
scripts.dev_remote-restart: ssh deploy@trademuch.trunksys.com 'export NVM_DIR="/home/deploy/.nvm";[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh";cp ~/trademuch_dev_local.js ~/trademuch/config/local.js;cd trademuch;  pm2 restart trademuch'
scripts.prod_remote-start: ssh deploy@trademuch.trunksys.com 'export NVM_DIR="/home/deploy/.nvm";[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"; cd trademuch-prod && pm2 start app.js -i 0 --name "trademuch-prod"'
scripts.prod_remote-restart: ssh deploy@trademuch.trunksys.com 'export NVM_DIR="/home/deploy/.nvm";[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh";cp ~/trademuch_prod_local.js ~/trademuch-prod/config/local.js;cd trademuch-prod;  pm2 restart trademuch-prod'
